Name: Cherry Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry &/or lemon zest twist.
Garnish with maraschino cherry &/or lemon zest twist.
Review: Rich cherry is balanced by botanically complex dry gin and citrus freshness, and further dried and deepened by vermouth.
History: Created in 2005 by yours truly in London, England. Originally based on citrus vodka, I amended this cocktail to be gin-based in May 2020 after the creation of my vodka-based Cherry Fruitini .
Nutrition: One serving of Cherry Martini contains 187 calories
